fields.doc: Timestamp when the Kafka message was created.
fields.name: kafka_timestamp

fields.doc: Target definition will be copied from this target. The 'to' and 'from' targets must be different.
fields.name: copyFrom

fields.doc: Target definition will be copied to this target. The 'to' and 'from' targets must be different. Use the same enumeration constants as copyFrom.
fields.name: copyTo
